text: The women's doubles was a tennis event held as part of the Tennis at the 1920 Summer Olympics programme. It was the first appearance of the event. A total of 18 players, comprising 9 pairs, from 5 nations competed in the event, which was held from 17 to 24 August 1920 at the Beerschot Tennis Club. ==Draw== ===Draw=== ==References== ==Sources== * * * ITF, 2008 Olympic Tennis Event Media Guide 1920 Women's doubles Category:1920 in women's tennis Ten
title: Tennis at the 1920 Summer Olympics – Women's doubles
